title: Most hilarious champion skin name you can come up with!
body:
Super skank sion 

:D

Edit: I would love to see riot pick up and develop even one of these hilarious skins, perhaps one of the funnier less filthy ones, pornstar soraka would scare the kids :D

replies.body: Pornstar Soraka {{champion:16}}  "no one expects the banana"
you are filthy! and i love it ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Shoklimb,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=G0hBq1UU,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2014-12-15T00:06:51.731+0000)
> dragonslayer slayer shyvana

Have you ever gone into a normal or ranked game as Shyvana and killed the dragon, then transformed into a dragon and said to your team "come kill dragon, it just spawned again" then the bronze 5 jungler and adc come to the pit and and say "it won't let us attack it WTF"
Yes this would be mad considering she did kill the dragon with everyone
I swear I'm a boy Ezreal.

the first two are superb sir!

the last three left me cringing a little ;)
Candy Kitten Karthus, "ill sweet love u to the grave"

I can bet money that one day this will become a skin.
